#include <cstdio>
using namespace std;
long long  n,k,niz[1005];
int main () {

    scanf("%lld %lld",&n,&k);
    for (long long i=1;i<=n;i++) {scanf("%lld",&niz[i]);
    }
    for (long long p=1;p<=n-1;p++) {

     for (long long a=p+1;a<=n;a++) {


    if (niz[p]+niz[a]==k) {printf ("Yes"); return 0; }
    }


    }


 printf ("No");



return 0;
}
